verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1112>Belshazzar<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto me, even unto me <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that which <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto me at the <S%H8462>first<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2377>vision<s%>; and it came to pass, when I <S%H7200>saw<s%>, that I was at <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> in the <S%H1002>palace<s%>, which is in the <S%H4082>province<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>; and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2377>vision<s%>, and I was by the <S%H180>river<s%> of <S%H195>Ulai<s%>.

Then I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%>, and, behold, there <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H180>river<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> which had two <S%H7161>horns<s%>: and the two <S%H7161>horns<s%> were <S%H1364>high<s%>; but <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H1364>higher<s%> than the <S%H8145>other<s%>, and the <S%H1364>higher<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H314>last<s%>.

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H5055>pushing<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, and <S%H6828>northward<s%>, and <S%H5045>southward<s%>; so that no <S%H2416>beasts<s%> might <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, neither was there any that could <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; but he <S%H6213>did<s%> according to his <S%H7522>will<s%>, and became <S%H1431>great<s%>.

And as I was <S%H995>considering<s%>, behold, an <S%H5795>he<s%> <S%H6842>goat<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H4628>west<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H5060>touched<s%> not the <S%H776>ground<s%>: and the <S%H6842>goat<s%> had a <S%H2380>notable<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> between his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H352>ram<s%> that <S%H1167>had<s%> two <S%H7161>horns<s%>, which I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H180>river<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%> unto him in the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of his <S%H3581>power<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H5060>come<s%> close <S%H681>unto<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and he was moved with <S%H4843>choler<s%> against him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and <S%H7665>brake<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%>: and there was no <S%H3581>power<s%> in the <S%H352>ram<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, but he cast him <S%H7993>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and <S%H7429>stamped<s%> upon him: and there was none that could <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H6842>he<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> waxed <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>: and when he was <S%H6105>strong<s%>, the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> was <S%H7665>broken<s%>; and for it came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> notable <S%H2380>ones<s%> toward the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And out of <S%H259>one<s%> of them came <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H4704>little<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%>, which waxed <S%H3499>exceeding<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>, toward the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and toward the <S%H4217>east<s%>, and toward the <S%H6643>pleasant<s%> land.

And it waxed <S%H1431>great<s%>, even to the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and it cast <S%H5307>down<s%> some of the <S%H6635>host<s%> and of the <S%H3556>stars<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and <S%H7429>stamped<s%> upon them.

Yea, he <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself even to the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>, and by him the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice was taken <S%H7311%H7311>away<s%>, and the <S%H4349>place<s%> of his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> was cast <S%H7993>down<s%>.

And an <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> him against the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice by reason of <S%H6588>transgression<s%>, and it cast <S%H7993>down<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>; and it <S%H6213>practised<s%>, and <S%H6743>prospered<s%>.

¶ Then I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6918>saint<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%>, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6918>saint<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto that <S%H6422>certain<s%> saint which <S%H1696>spake<s%>, How long shall be the <S%H2377>vision<s%> concerning the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice, and the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of <S%H8074>desolation<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> both the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H6635>host<s%> to be trodden under <S%H4823>foot<s%>?
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Unto two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6153%H1242>days<s%>; then shall the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> be <S%H6663>cleansed<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when I, even I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, had <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%>, and <S%H1245>sought<s%> for the <S%H998>meaning<s%>, then, behold, there <S%H5975>stood<s%> before me as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%>.

And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> between the banks of <S%H195>Ulai<s%>, which <S%H7121>called<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1403>Gabriel<s%>, make <S%H1975>this<s%> man to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H4758>vision<s%>.

So he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> where I <S%H5977>stood<s%>: and when he <S%H935>came<s%>, I was <S%H1204>afraid<s%>, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon my <S%H6440>face<s%>: but he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H995>Understand<s%>, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>: for at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be the <S%H2377>vision<s%>.

Now as he was <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with me, I was in a deep <S%H7290>sleep<s%> on my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground<s%>: but he <S%H5060>touched<s%> me, and <S%H5975>set<s%> me <S%H5977>upright<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, I will make thee <S%H3045>know<s%> what shall be in the last <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H2195>indignation<s%>: for at the time <S%H4150>appointed<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> shall be.
The <S%H352>ram<s%> which thou <S%H7200>sawest<s%> <S%H1167>having<s%> two <S%H7161>horns<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4074>Media<s%> and <S%H6539>Persia<s%>.

And the <S%H8163>rough<s%> <S%H6842>goat<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3120>Grecia<s%>: and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> that is between his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> is the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Now that being <S%H7665>broken<s%>, whereas <S%H702>four<s%> stood <S%H5975>up<s%> for it, <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4438>kingdoms<s%> shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%> out of the <S%H1471>nation<s%>, but not in his <S%H3581>power<s%>.

And in the latter <S%H319>time<s%> of their <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, when the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> are come to the <S%H8552>full<s%>, a <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, and <S%H995>understanding<s%> dark <S%H2420>sentences<s%>, shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%>.

And his <S%H3581>power<s%> shall be <S%H6105>mighty<s%>, but not by his own <S%H3581>power<s%>: and he shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H6381>wonderfully<s%>, and shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%>, and <S%H6213>practise<s%>, and shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6099>mighty<s%> and the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And through his <S%H7922>policy<s%> also he shall cause <S%H4820>craft<s%> to <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and he shall <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself in his <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and by <S%H7962>peace<s%> shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>: he shall also stand <S%H5975>up<s%> against the <S%H8269>Prince<s%> of <S%H8269>princes<s%>; but he shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And the <S%H4758>vision<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> which was <S%H559>told<s%> is <S%H571>true<s%>: wherefore shut thou <S%H5640>up<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%>; for it shall be for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H1961>fainted<s%>, and was <S%H2470>sick<s%> certain <S%H3117>days<s%>; afterward I rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%>; and I was <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at the <S%H4758>vision<s%>, but none <S%H995>understood<s%> it.
